name: SKAttribute
desc: A specification for dynamic per-node data used with a custom shader.

items.name: enum SKAttributeType
items.desc: Options that specify an attribute's data type.

items.name: init(name: String, type: SKAttributeType)
items.desc: Creates and initializes a new attribute object of a specified type with a name that can be referenced within the shader.

items.name: var type: SKAttributeType
items.desc: The data type of the attribute's value.
